name: Santa vs The Red Box of Krampus
name_original: Santa vs The Red Box of Krampus
description: This was made in 4 hours by myself as part of the Christmas micro gamejam with the theme of Santa vs Krampus. I naturally went towards a boss fight as it was probably the most viable considering I had to do everything myself. It turned out okay considering the amount of time I had to work on it. It does still have a few bugs and I do need to redo the artwork so that it is my own if I ever release this game fully
